author: Ada Lovelace
quote: The more I study, the more insatiable I feel my genius for it to be.

author: Grace Hopper
quote: The most dangerous phrase in the language is: 'We've always done it this way.'

author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

author: Margaret Hamilton
quote: One of the things that I did was to bring discipline and software engineering to the software development process.

author: Alan Turing
quote: I believe that at the end of the day, programming is just problem solving. If you can solve a problem, you can program.

author: Linus Torvalds
quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

author: Myles Burrows
quote: Build small software that will benefit YOU!
